name: Schwartz Cajun Wedges 38G
description: A crunchy oven-baked recipe mix with cumin, chillies and thyme for Cajun-style potato wedges.
For recipes and cooking suggestions visit: www.schwartz.co.uk
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>4</Number_Of_Uses><Recipes>For Our Recipe you will need ...1 sachet Schwartz Spicy Cajun Wedges Recipe Mix4 medium potatoes (approx. 675g (1 1/2 lbs)), unpeeled2 tbs olive oilDirections ...1. Pre-heat a large baking tray in the oven at 200°C, 400°F, Gas Mark 6.2. Cut dry potatoes into wedges, place into a bowl and coat with oil. Sprinkle over sachet contents and toss to coat evenly.3. Spread potatoes onto pre-heated baking tray and cook for 45 minutes, or until crispy and cooked through, turning half-way through.4. Serve as a delicious alternative to chips. Great served with soured cream.</Recipes></Cooking_Instructions>
aisle: Packet Mixes & Pour Over Sauce Mixes
PromotionDescription: Save 60p on any Tesco slow cooker seasoning mix 90g pot
